metadata.title: CVE-2022-3115 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6.malidp_crtc_reset in drivers/gpu/drm/arm/malidp_crtc.c lacks check of thereturn value of kzalloc() and will cause the null pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-47-generic - 5.15.0-47.51
linux-image-5.15.0-47-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-47.51
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-47-generic - 5.15.0-47.51
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-47-generic-64k - 5.15.0-47.51
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1017-kvm - 5.15.0-1017.21
No subscription required
